1: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> יִקַּ֥ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>hath taken</n> אִ֛ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>When a man</n> אִשָּׁ֖ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>a wife</n> וּבְעָלָ֑הּ <sup>1166 </sup> <n>and married</n> וְהָיָ֞ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>happens</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> לֹ֧א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> תִמְצָא־ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>her and it come to pass that she find</n> חֵ֣ן <sup>2580 </sup> <n>no favour</n> בְּעֵינָ֗יו <sup>5869 </sup> <n>in his eyes</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> מָ֤צָא <sup>4672 </sup> <n>because he hath found</n> בָהּ֙ עֶרְוַ֣ת <sup>6172 </sup> <n>uncleanness</n> דָּבָ֔ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>some</n> וְכָ֨תַב <sup>3789 </sup> <n>in her then let him write</n> לָ֜הּ סֵ֤פֶר <sup>5612 </sup> <n>her a bill</n> כְּרִיתֻת֙ <sup>3748 </sup> <n>of divorcement</n> וְנָתַ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and give</n> בְּיָדָ֔הּ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>[it] in her hand</n> וְשִׁלְּחָ֖הּ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>and send</n> מִבֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>her out of his house</n>

19: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> תִקְצֹר֩ <sup>7114 </sup> <n>When thou cuttest down</n> קְצִֽירְךָ֨ <sup>7105 </sup> <n>thine harvest</n> בְשָׂדֶ֜ךָ <sup>7704 </sup> <n>in thy field</n> וְשָֽׁכַחְתָּ֧ <sup>7911 </sup> <n>and hast forgot</n> עֹ֣מֶר <sup>6016 </sup> <n>a sheaf</n> בַּשָּׂדֶ֗ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>in the field</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תָשׁוּב֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>thou shalt not go again</n> לְקַחְתּ֔וֹ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>to fetch</n> לַגֵּ֛ר <sup>1616 </sup> <n>it it shall be for the stranger</n> לַיָּת֥וֹם <sup>3490 </sup> <n>for the fatherless</n> וְלָאַלְמָנָ֖ה <sup>490 </sup> <n>and for the widow</n> יִהְיֶ֑ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לְמַ֤עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>order</n> יְבָרֶכְךָ֙ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>may bless</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>that the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n> בְּכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <sup>4639 </sup> <n>thee in all the work</n> יָדֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of thine hands</n>
20: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> תַחְבֹּט֙ <sup>2251 </sup> <n>When thou beatest</n> זֵֽיתְךָ֔ <sup>2132 </sup> <n>thine olive tree</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>over</n> תְפָאֵ֖ר <sup>6286 </sup> <n>thou shalt not go over the boughs</n> אַחֲרֶ֑יךָ <sup>310 </sup> <n>again</n> לַגֵּ֛ר <sup>1616 </sup> <n>it shall be for the stranger</n> לַיָּת֥וֹם <sup>3490 </sup> <n>for the fatherless</n> וְלָאַלְמָנָ֖ה <sup>490 </sup> <n>and for the widow</n> יִהְיֶֽה׃ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> ס
21: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>When</n> תִבְצֹר֙ <sup>1219 </sup> <n>When thou gatherest</n> כַּרְמְךָ֔ <sup>3754 </sup> <n>the grapes of thy vineyard</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תְעוֹלֵ֖ל <sup>5953 </sup> <n>thou shalt not glean</n> אַחֲרֶ֑יךָ <sup>310 </sup> <n>[it] afterward</n> לַגֵּ֛ר <sup>1616 </sup> <n>it shall be for the stranger</n> לַיָּת֥וֹם <sup>3490 </sup> <n>for the fatherless</n> וְלָאַלְמָנָ֖ה <sup>490 </sup> <n>and for the widow</n> יִהְיֶֽה׃ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n>
